subject: $market captured by $faction
summary: $faction forces have taken control of $market, previously held by $oldOwnerWithArticle.
assessment: The $oldOwner have $marketsRemaining planets/station(s) left.

subject: $market captured by $faction
summary: $faction forces led by $playerName have taken control of $market, previously held by $oldOwnerWithArticle.
assessment: The $oldOwner have $marketsRemaining planets/station(s) left.

subject: $defeatedFaction driven from Exerelin
summary: The $defeatedFaction have lost their last planet or station, and their surviving fleets are taking refuge elsewhere. Their ambitions in the Exerelin cluster are clearly over.
assessment: The $defeatedFaction are no longer a relevant player in the cluster.

subject: $defeatedFaction driven from Exerelin
summary: The $defeatedFaction have lost their last planet or station, and their surviving fleets are taking refuge elsewhere. Their ambitions in the Exerelin cluster are clearly over.
assessment: With your faction beaten and scattered, you are on your own with whatever allies you still have or can cobble up, until such time as you can reassert $theDefeatedFaction's presence in the cluster.

subject: $defeatedFaction driven from Exerelin
summary: The $defeatedFaction have lost their last planet or station, and their surviving fleets are taking refuge elsewhere. Their ambitions in the Exerelin cluster are clearly over.
assessment: With the defeat of $theDefeatedFaction, your $victorFaction reigns supreme over the Exerelin cluster. Congratulations!

subject: $faction arrives in Exerelin
summary: The $faction are moving into the Exerelin cluster, with a foothold in $market.

subject: $faction returns to Exerelin
summary: The $faction have regained a foothold in the Exerelin cluster, at $market.

subject: Monthly salary report: $paid received
summary: You have received $paid from $employer for your continued services.

subject: Aid package by $otherFaction for $faction
summary: $otherFaction authorities have sent a charitable aid package to $faction citizens on $market. Local officials have expressed their gratitude.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction improved by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $otherFaction philanthropist donates to $faction
summary: An influential private figure in $theOtherFaction has made a generous donation on $market. This has improved relations with $theFaction.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction improved by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $otherFaction cultural boom amongst $faction
summary: Popular media works from $theOtherFaction have gained a strong following on $market, leading to a $faction interest in strengthened cultural ties.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction improved by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $faction-$otherFaction celebrity wedding
summary: The marriage of two celebrities from $theFaction and $theOtherFaction is the hottest new media sensation, with even official figures quick to play themselves into the matter.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction improved by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $faction-$otherFaction treaty signed
summary: Officials of $theFaction and $theOtherFaction have signed an agreement to further cooperation on areas of mutual interest.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction improved by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $otherFaction helps prevent terror attack on $market
summary: Official statements by $theFaction praise $theOtherFaction for its assistance in foiling a terrorist plot on $market.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction improved by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: Wanted $otherFaction criminal turned over by $faction
summary: Police on $market have extradited a wanted $otherFaction criminal. Law enforcement officials have praised the cooperation of $faction authorities.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction improved by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $faction forms close pact with $otherFaction
summary: $theFaction and $theOtherFaction have signed a new agreement for much closer military and trade associations.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction improved by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $faction-$otherFaction romance thrills public
summary: Media reports of a "Romeo & Juliet" forbidden romance between a couple from $theFaction and $otherFaction have captivated the public imagination, and led to a thawing of relations between the two factions.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction improved by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $faction and $otherFaction declare ceasefire
summary: Weary of the fighting, $theFaction and $theOtherFaction have agreed to a cessation of hostilities. Nevertheless, relations remain tense.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction improved by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $faction signs peace treaty with $otherFaction
summary: $theFaction and $theOtherFaction have set aside their differences and signed a lasting peace treaty.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction improved by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $otherFaction diplomacy blunder with $faction
summary: A diplomatic faux pas by a $otherFaction delegate has caused grave offence to $faction officials on $market.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $faction-$otherFaction talks break down
summary: $otherFaction delegates walked out of a meeting at $market today, dissatisfied with the hard line taken by $faction negotiators. The incident has ruffled feathers on both sides.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $otherFaction groom jilts $faction bride
summary: $market tabloids are abuzz with the news of a prominent $otherFaction figure who abandoned his $faction bride at the altar. The woman's influential family - and large segments of the public - are outraged.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.
implementation notes: Also as seen in Civilization IV

subject: $otherFaction political manipulation against $faction exposed
summary: $faction officials have accused $theOtherFaction of funding opposition groups on $market. The resulting dispute has soured relations between the two factions.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: Wave of anti-$otherFaction sentiment in $faction
summary: A sharp increase in hostility to $theOtherFaction on $market has been observed. $otherFaction citizens are being harassed and even assaulted on the streets, with authorities slow to respond.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $faction harbors $otherFaction criminal
summary: $faction authorities are refusing to turn over an escaped $otherFaction criminal on $market, despite official protests through diplomatic channels.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.
implementation notes: channel = news to keep it with the same icon as the others, until an icon for all is found

subject: $otherFaction spy ring uncovered by $faction
summary: Rumors have surfaced that $faction counter-intelligence has broken up a spy ring operated by $theOtherFaction. Although official figures remain silent on the matter, it's clear that diplomatic relations are suffering.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $faction thwarts $otherFaction sabotage attempt
summary: $faction officials announce the arrest of an attempted $otherFaction saboteur on $market. The $otherFaction leadership denies any involvement.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $otherFaction sponsors $faction rebels
summary: Authorities have accused $theOtherFaction of sponsoring anti-$faction rebels on $market, and threatened retaliation.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $otherFaction envoy heads crime ring in $faction territory
summary: Police on $market have broken up a crime syndicate operated by a $otherFaction envoy. While $theOtherFaction have disavowed the diplomat's actions, relations with $theFaction have nevertheless cooled.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $faction accuses $otherFaction of privateering
summary: $theFaction has accused $theOtherFaction of sponsoring privateers to attack its shipping. A formal military response has been considered.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: Shots fired between $faction and $otherFaction
summary: Unconfirmed news reports have arrived of a shootout between forces of $theFaction and $theOtherFaction near $market. As of the time of writing, a state of war exists between the two factions.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $otherFaction spreads faith among $faction
summary: $otherFaction missionaries are spreading their religion amongst the people of $market. This has created a common bond with $theFaction.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction improved by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $otherFaction adherents persecuted by $faction
summary: $otherFaction adherents on $market are facing social and state penalties for their faith, ranging from ostracism to beatings and confiscation of property. This has greatly angered $otherFaction believers elsewhere.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $faction authorities crack down on $otherFaction heathens
summary: $otherFaction figures have condemned the actions of $theFaction in suppressing "heresy" on $market, describing as "persecution" and "inquisition" such acts as forced conversions and false criminal accusations against $otherFaction non-believers.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $otherFaction clergy in $faction in scandal
summary: An $otherFaction clergyman on $market has been charged with embezzlement of church funds and various sexual offences. Opinion polls show a marked decrease in respect for $theOtherFaction among $faction citizens.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $otherFaction condemns $faction suppression of dissidents
summary: $otherFaction officials and commentators have harshly criticized the actions of $faction authorities, who have arrested and beaten scores of dissidents and activists on $market.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $otherFaction targeted by $faction anti-corporate movement
summary: $theOtherFaction is in the crosshairs of a populist anti-corporate movement on $market, which sees it as an oppressive, exploitative entity. Movement leaders are pressing $faction authorities to crack down on $theOtherFaction's various crimes.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.

subject: $faction accuses $otherFaction of stealing tech
summary: A major $faction R&D facility on $market reports the theft of large amounts of advanced technology and related data. $theOtherFaction is denying accusations of responsibility for the attack.
assessment: Relations between $faction and $otherFaction reduced by $deltaAbs, currently at $newRelationStr.
